[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@elux/react-web](./react-web.md) &gt; [location](./react-web.location.md)

## location() function

创建路由Location转换器

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function location(dataOrUrl: string | EluxLocation | StateLocation | NativeLocation): ULocationTransform;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataOrUrl | string \| [EluxLocation](./react-web.eluxlocation.md) \| [StateLocation](./react-web.statelocation.md) \| [NativeLocation](./react-web.nativelocation.md) | 3种路由描述或3种路由协议的url |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ULocationTransform](./react-web.ulocationtransform.md)

路由Location转换器

## Remarks

框架中内置3种路由描述分别是：NativeLocation，EluxLocation，StateLocation，其中 StateLocation 为`标准形态`<!-- -->，其余2种为临时形态

对应的3种Url路由协议分别是：`n://xxx?_={...}`<!-- -->，`e://xxx?{...}`<!-- -->，`s://xxx?{...}`

其转换关系通常为：NativeLocation -<!-- -->&gt; EluxLocation -<!-- -->&gt; StateLocation
